Text: THANKS!!!  These complete uploads are a real treat and time saver.

***Can we get a little info on what this package includes, please...?
      Some of us are old-schoolers, who are trying to catch-up. Thanks!
      ...I'm going back to my cave now...   :P

***A little info on what the package includes, would be GREAT... What titles?  How many?...

THANK YOU~

it includes flashpoint 1-5 and all the stories that come with it (booster gold complete set, batman and such) only missing file that i don't have was hal jordan # 2 that one got mixed up somewhere and can't seem to be able to find it so sorry about that. this seen more as an update pack and it would be used to fill the missing gaps that you guys may have skipped
thank you! I wasn't able to find the 3rd batman ish anywhere, I thought the scanners forgot about it.
thanks master. I gotta start following your page from now on, I found 3 more that I had been missing.
You're kidding me, someone actually uploaded? Dude! Nice job!

Good day! This is actually my 1st time reading a comic and I would just like to ask some questions regarding the said collection. What number do the 2 missing issues count as? And do I need to read them according to the numbering the uploader has numbered it? Thanks so much for the response!
FYI - Although you might notice on the cover of The Reverse Flash that it says "Issue 1 of 3" it is actually a misprint as the The Reverse Flash was meant to be a one shot. Threw me for a loop.
